description: Used React/Next extensively for all my projects
I prefer typescript whenever it is necessary
I prefer using TailwindCSS, but it's with SASS, or even vanilla as well.
Fine with Bootstrap, Material UI, Shad CN, or whatever
Have worked with Redux Toolkit, Zustand, MobX, Tanstack Query
I use Jest and Cypress for testing React Application
I use Git for version control and collaboration
Good with docker based development and deployment.
Haved worked with EC2, Lightsail, S3, and few more services.
Haved worked with Google Search Console, Analytics and Adsense.
Good with making robust web servers with Authentication & Authorisation.
I have worked with MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL
